title: 竹（和风）mod严重BUG
author: OVAmach
txt_content:
如果将温泉机发出的水放置在第0层会导致崩溃
服务器崩溃日志在此。。。。
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I feel sad now :(

Time: 14-8-2 下午11:40
Description: Exception while ticking a block

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at ruby.bamboo.block.BlockSpaWater.setThisChildBlock(BlockSpaWater.java:182)
        at ruby.bamboo.block.BlockSpaWater.spread(BlockSpaWater.java:133)
        at ruby.bamboo.block.BlockSpaWater.func_71847_b(BlockSpaWater.java:114)

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:625)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(ThreadMinecraftServer.java:16)

replies.author: OVAmach
replies.txt_content: 希望装了此mod的腐竹们可以关注一下
我不爱和风mod，也没开过大于5人的服233

开和风要BAN
